ygData.subject: RE: Hey Harmonic, time to press that optional download  again!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually i understood it to be that paineel is the necromancer city that split from erudin due to differences. This is the entrance that is accessible
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:48 PM 2/12/2000 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>supposedly its an evil city for necros and SKs. you can now start an
>erudite SK and the character starts in paineel. its on the test server but
>not yet optimized or something. The Hole is the zone on toxxulia that
>should be a somewhat high-level dungeon.
>
>Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L39 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>

Actually i understood it to be that paineel is the necromancer city that
split from erudin due to "differences." This is the entrance that is
accessible via tox. As soon as you zone into paineel you see a large pit
that if you fall into safely drops you back outside in tox for the time
being. I would wager that when the hole is brought online, that pit IS the
hole... i remember reading before that the hole sat underneath paineel.
